title: LUFFY VS MAGELLAN!! - One Piece Episode 434 & 435 REACTION + REVIEW!
description: A reaction and review video covering the confrontation between Luffy and Magellan in Episodes 434 and 435.

title: Episode 434 Discussion - One Piece Community
author: One Piece Community
description: Fan discussion thread about Episode 434. Viewers appreciated the plot progression beyond repeated level-by-level fights, and found Mr. 2 Bon Clay's moment of calling out Buggy and Mr. 3 for not being manly enough to be hilarious.

title: One Piece Episode 434 - All Forces Have Gathered! The Battle on Level 4, the Burning Heat Hell!
author: Toei Animation
description: Official streaming of Episode 434 on Crunchyroll, available since September 27, 2014.
